title: 1(2) of the Birth Information and Tracing Act 2022 (No. 14 of 2022), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Birth Information and Tracing Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Birth Information and Tracing Act 2022 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited birth information tracing act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: 1(2) of the Birth Information and Tracing Act 2022 (No. 14 of 2022), hereby
heading: 2. The 1st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Birth Information and Tracing Act 2022 shall come into 
operation: 

(a) Part 1, other than section 5; 

(b) 

section 33; 

(c) 

section 34; 

(d) Part 6; 

(e) Part 10, other than sections 64 and 70. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [312] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 June, 2022. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [312]
